original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 326.00/25 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 326.00/25 to the US dollar on Thursday, from 326.75/85 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 13.70/80 percent from 13.70/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 13.80/90 percent from 13.60/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.05/10 percent from 14.05/15 percent.
The CSE opened up; the ASPI was up 0.31 percent at 10,636, the S&P SL20 was up 0.64 percent at 3,064. (Colombo/Dec21/2023)
